nodes.id: 中央党的建设工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央党的建设工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局领导的“党的建设”工作议事协调机构，1988年成立，负责对党建工作领域的重大问题进行决策。
description.en: A deliberation and coordination body for 'Party building' work under the leadership of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. Established in 1988, it is responsible for making decisions on major issues in the field of Party building.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央党的建设工作领导小组组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央党的建设工作领导小组副组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中央党的建设工作领导小组副组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中央党的建设工作领导小组成员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as a member of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中央党的建设工作领导小组成员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as a member of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的常设机构，是中国共产党的最高决策机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the highest decision-making organ of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导层。
description.en: The top leadership of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央党的建设工作领导小组首任组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the first Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记的职务简称。
description.en: The abbreviated title for the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央党的建设工作领导小组组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who once served as the Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家副元首的职务。
description.en: The office of the Vice Head of State of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会。
description.en: The 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾于2007年至2012年兼任中央党的建设工作领导小组组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who concurrently served as the Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building from 2007 to 2012.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央党的建设工作领导小组副组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who once served as a Deputy Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管组织、干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for organizational and personnel work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央党的建设工作领导小组副组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who once served as a Deputy Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央党的建设工作领导小组副组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who once served as a Deputy Leader of the Central Leading Group for Party Building.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，中央党的建设工作领导小组的上级机构是中国共产党中央委员会。
description.en: According to the infobox, the superior body of the Central Leading Group for Party Building is the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中央党的建设工作领导小组
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中央党的建设工作领导小组是中国共产党中央政治局领导的议事协调机构。
description.en: The Central Leading Group for Party Building is a deliberation and coordination body led by the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中央党的建设工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 现任组长由蔡奇兼任。
description.en: The current leader is concurrently held by Cai Qi.

relationships.target: 中央党的建设工作领导小组
